## PCA Exercise
Edit the code below and click "Run".

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)

# We define a tiny Shiny app inside this block to act like learnr
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Interactive PCA"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      checkboxInput("scale", "Scale Data?", TRUE)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      verbatimTextOutput("pca_out"),
      plotOutput("pca_plot")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$pca_out <- renderPrint({
    prcomp(mtcars, scale. = input$scale)
  })
  output$pca_plot <- renderPlot({
    biplot(prcomp(mtcars, scale. = input$scale))
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
